(ignore this - it doesn't get used yet) What is your Firebase project's ID?
You cannot use server-side rendering. Your site must be static. This means that, among other things, svelte-add/graphql-server is currently not suitable to be hosted on Firebase.

Consider setting up GitHub Actions for automatic building and deployment to Firebase.

Start by generating a CI login token from Firebase:

{@html `npm run firebase login:ci`}

Then, go to your repositoryâ€™s Settings > Secrets. Copy the result of the command above and save it as a Secret named FIREBASE_TOKEN.

You can test if itâ€™s working by making a commit to main or master and checking the Actions tab of your repository to see if your project successfully builds and deploys to Firebase.
You can create a custom 404 page at src/routes/404.svelte.
You can use the deploy package script to manually deploy the site after a build.
